section: Member Duties Description BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: The description of BorrowMoney.com, inc's duties is vaguely defined. Stating '*HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements...' lacks specificity. This leads to potential disputes on the extent of their technical obligations and what constitutes 'all technical aspect requirements'.

section: Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The contribution of BorrowMoney.com, Inc. is listed as 'To be determined USD'. This lack of a defined contribution contradicts the concept of a joint venture where each member is expected to invest something of value. This omission creates uncertainty and could be grounds for legal challenge.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: This clause is contradictory because it leaves the valuation of a withdrawing member's interest solely to the discretion of the remaining members, which could lead to unfair or biased valuations. The first sentance implies there is a procedure in place if there is a written agreement setting the value. This implies that the other parties have some sort of process but it is not defined.
